name: taskflow-ai
description: TaskFlow AI Smart Team Task Manager

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Backend,Main,Admin,Mobile" -c "red,blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.dev:web: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Backend,Main,Admin" -c "red,blue,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.start:production: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Backend,Main,Admin" -c "red,blue,green" "npm run start:backend" "npm run serve:main" "npm run serve:admin"
scripts.clean: turbo run clean && npm run clean:node_modules
scripts.show:ports: echo "Backend: http://localhost:3001" && echo "Main App: http://localhost:5173" && echo "Admin Panel: http://localhost:5175" && echo "Mobile: Expo DevTools (port 19000)"
scripts.show:status: echo "TaskFlow AI Development Environment" && echo "===============================" && npm run show:ports
